name: QT-5 Rush
description:
QT-5 Rush is an action game about robots.

Warning:This's a indie game.

The game gives you vast possibilities to customize your own robot using 6 properties.

You can get almost 50 different pieces of equipment, which can be mixed into a thousand combinations.

In the game, you will find abundant robotic hardware and unique skills, 4 planet scenes, each with their particular boss.

Story:On an abandoned planet, there are still a small amount of resources.

Some robots were left to finish the collection.

A revolution against human’s domination was broken out since some robots suddenly gained the ability of logic.

Except for you—loyal Alex—a robot with high study ability. So you became the enemy of those ambitious robots.

Can you rescue Dr. S and revenge your good friend, Halley?

Who gave those robots the logic ability?

These mysteries are expecting for you to unravel…
